General.Name: Beijing Asiacom Information Technology Co.Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Asiacom Information Technology Co,.Ltd engages in the provision of information services. The company provides cloud and digital solutions, which includes cloud integration, MSP management, private cloud construction, and hybrid cloud management services; computing power infrastructure services, such as product operation and maintenance delivery, comprehensive data center, and integrated delivery services; and system integration services. It also offers general solutions comprising data center, hybrid cloud center, telecommuting, and video conferencing solutions; and industry solutions consist of internet industry, medical industry, energy industry, and E-commerce industry solutions. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
